description: This file defines a ConfluenceTools class that provides methods to interact with Atlassian Confluence, including retrieving page content, space details, creating and updating pages. It is a utility module for managing Confluence content programmatically.

classes.name: ConfluenceTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Atlassian Confluence, providing methods to retrieve, create, and update pages, as well as fetch space details.

methods.name: get_page_content
methods.description: Retrieves the content of a specific Confluence page by space name and page title, returning JSON data or error message.

methods.name: get_all_space_detail
methods.description: Fetches details about all Confluence spaces.

methods.name: get_space_key
methods.description: Retrieves the space key for a given space name.

methods.name: get_all_page_from_space
methods.description: Retrieves all pages from a specified Confluence space.

methods.name: create_page
methods.description: Creates a new page in a specified Confluence space.

methods.name: update_page
methods.description: Updates an existing Confluence page by page ID.
